name: Sea Scrapper
description:
SEAJAM - #TeamSeas Game Jam!

Made in a little bit over 2 weeks.

You've got your new job as a scrapper at an uninhabited island. All you need to do is to collect scrap metals and electronics. Sounds simple right?

That's up until you wanted to clean the sea and get into a deep mess.

[IMPORTANT]

  • Gameplay might take 1-2 hours.
  • I haven't played the v0.1 that was submitted for the jame
  • v0.2 contains bug fixes but was published after the jam period, don't play this one if you want to see what I was able to do during the jam period!

Subscribe to my socials! I'll make a post mortem on this in the coming weeks!

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuSwRexVyHQ0HGTnVCHqfVQ

TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@paopalmaa?lang=en
